changeSet.createView: SELECT a.ActivityID ,a.FacilityReportID AS inReport ,aia.Code AS annexIActivity ,aia.IPPCCode AS AnnexIActivityIPPCCode ,a.RankingNumeric ,a.MainActivityIndicator ,aia.Code + ' - ' + aia.Name + CASE a.MainActivityIndicator WHEN 1 THEN ' (main)' ELSE '' END AS 'rdfs:label' FROM dbo.ACTIVITY AS a INNER JOIN dbo.FACILITYREPORT AS fr ON fr.FacilityReportID = a.FacilityReportID INNER JOIN dbo.vAT_POLLUTANTRELEASEANDTRANSFERREPORT AS prtr ON prtr.PollutantReleaseAndTransferReportID = fr.PollutantReleaseAndTransferReportID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.LOV_ANNEXIACTIVITY AS aia ON a.LOV_AnnexIActivityID = aia.LOV_AnnexIActivityID
